62510253-d63a-4b78-8319-7c41f6e1e7ca.objective: Build a multi-market Performance Marketing Dashboard for STAGE OTT that consolidates data from 4 markets (Gujarati, Haryanvi, Rajasthani, Bhojpuri), supports bulk Excel upload (5-10 files), provides one-click market switching, displays comprehensive metrics (Spends, Trials, CAC, IR, TR, D0 TCR, CTR) across multiple breakdowns (Overall, Channel-wise, Platform-wise, Show-wise, Market Comparison), and generates AI-powered actionable insights to reduce 1-hour solver meetings to 15-minute data-driven decision sessions for CEO and founders.
